lore: Some Nixes are banished from their towns and cities for serious crimes. Many look for underground caves to settle alone or with others of their kind who have also been exiled. Others seek their fortune by working for the less important or newer crime syndicates. Their methods are usually less orthodox than those of the other Nixes, and their goals are much more varied. When they carry out a mission, their success rate is clearly lower and they often make a mess.
menagerieDialog: Leave me alone. I must rest before we venture forth into a new Realm.
You should strive to be more efficient. There's no need to stop back at your castle between every single realm.
I hear you've got a problem that needs solved.
My blade is ready. Let's assassinate some kings.
This castle is so loud and overwhelming. I can't wait to get out of here.
name: Nix Exile
